mapper.select: select id from odr_construction_daily where isnull(rc_id);

SELECT r.id as rcId, r.record_time as recordTime, (case r.line when '1号线' then 1 when '3号线' then 3 end) as line, r.weekly_plan_construction_quantity as weeklyPlanConstructionQuantity, r.weekly_actual_construction_quantity as weeklyActualConstructionQuantity, r.daily_plan_construction_quantity as dailyPlanConstructionQuantity, r.daily_actual_construction_quantity as dailyActualConstructionQuantity, r.temp_plan_construction_quantity as tempPlanConstructionQuantity, r.temp_actual_construction_quantity as tempActualConstructionQuantity, r.repair_plan_construction_quantity as repairPlanConstructionQuantity, r.repair_actual_construction_quantity as repairActualConstructionQuantity, r.total_plan_construction_quantity as totalPlanConstructionQuantity, r.total_actual_construction_quantity as totalActualConstructionQuantity, r.description FROM odr_rc_construction_daily r WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM odr_construction_daily o WHERE o.rc_id = r.id )
